types.description: Receives string packages (or load-time configurations) with tunes to be played by a piezo buzzer/speaker over PWM

in_ports.description: The tablature string to play on the node. The syntax for it is <note_array|beats_array|base_tempo_in_us>, as in 'ccggaa|111122|300' -- that plays do do sol sol la la in such a way that the first four notes last 300 ms and the last two hold for 600 ms. Possible individual notes are 'a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e', 'f', 'g', 'C', and beats can only be on the 1-9 range.
in_ports.name: TUNE

types.name: piezo-speaker/sound

members.description: Label of the desired pin on the board. If raw is set to true, this should be "<device> <channel>" pair, e.g. "0 3".
members.name: pin

members.description: Change 'pin' meaning to be the system parameters needed to address the desired pin. Use it if you know what you are doing.
members.name: raw

members.description: Whether to loop indefinetely on the input tune
members.name: loop
